xylanNtpPeerTable.name: xylanNtpPeerTable
xylanNtpPeerTable.description: Table containing the synchronization host this switch will be associated with.

xylanNtpPeerEntry.name: xylanNtpPeerEntry
xylanNtpPeerEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to a synchronization host.

xylanNtpPeerAddress.name: xylanNtpPeerAddress
xylanNtpPeerAddress.description: The IP address of the synchronization host.

xylanNtpPeerType.name: xylanNtpPeerType
xylanNtpPeerType.description: Type of synchronization host that will communicate with this switch.

xylanNtpPeerAuth.name: xylanNtpPeerAuth
xylanNtpPeerAuth.description: The authorization keyid for the remote host.

xylanNtpPeerVersion.name: xylanNtpPeerVersion
xylanNtpPeerVersion.description: The NTP version to communicate with the remote host.

xylanNtpPeerMinpoll.name: xylanNtpPeerMinpoll
xylanNtpPeerMinpoll.description: The minimum poll duration to the remote host. This value is a power of 2 seconds when the poll will occur. For example, 4 (2 to the power 4) is 16 seconds.

xylanNtpPeerPrefer.name: xylanNtpPeerPrefer
xylanNtpPeerPrefer.description: Marks the host as a preferred connection.

xylanNtpPeerAdmin.name: xylanNtpPeerAdmin
xylanNtpPeerAdmin.description: The current state of the table entry. If the value written is a 2, the entry is deleted.

xylanNtpPeerName.name: xylanNtpPeerName
xylanNtpPeerName.description: The DNS name for the peer association,

xylanNtpAuthDelay.name: xylanNtpAuthDelay
xylanNtpAuthDelay.description: This field sets a specified time interval that is added to timestamps included in requests to the server that required authentication. Typically this delay is needed in cases of long delay paths, or servers whose clocks are unsynchronized. Value is in milli-seconds

xylanNtpKeysFile.name: xylanNtpKeysFile
xylanNtpKeysFile.description: Name of the file which has the authorization keys.

xylanNtpConfigReqKeyId.name: xylanNtpConfigReqKeyId
xylanNtpConfigReqKeyId.description: Request messages ask for information from the NTP entity such as timestamp information, statistics, etc. This changes the authentication key identifier for request messages sent from the switch to another NTP entity.

xylanNtpConfigCtlKeyId.name: xylanNtpConfigCtlKeyId
xylanNtpConfigCtlKeyId.description: Control messages attempt to change the configuration of the NTP entity in some fashion. This changes the authentication key identifier for control messages sent from the switch to another NTP entity.

xylanNtpConfigCfgKeyId.name: xylanNtpConfigCfgKeyId
xylanNtpConfigCfgKeyId.description: Configuration messages changes information on the NTP entity.

xylanNtpPrecision.name: xylanNtpPrecision
xylanNtpPrecision.description: This sets the server's advertised precision.

xylanNtpPeerListTable.name: xylanNtpPeerListTable
xylanNtpPeerListTable.description: Used to display a brief list of all NTP associations related to this switch (servers, peers, etc.).

xylanNtpPeerListEntry.name: xylanNtpPeerListEntry
xylanNtpPeerListEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one association.

xylanNtpPeerListAddress.name: xylanNtpPeerListAddress
xylanNtpPeerListAddress.description: The IP address of the association.

xylanNtpPeerListLocal.name: xylanNtpPeerListLocal
xylanNtpPeerListLocal.description: The local interface address assigned by NTP to the remote association. If this address is 0.0.0.0, then the local address has yet to be determined.

xylanNtpPeerListStratum.name: xylanNtpPeerListStratum
xylanNtpPeerListStratum.description: The stratum level of the remote peer. If this number is 16, the remote peer has not been synchronized.

xylanNtpPeerListReach.name: xylanNtpPeerListReach
xylanNtpPeerListReach.description: The reachability register of the remote association, in octal format. This number is determined by the NTP algorithm.

xylanNtpPeerListDelay.name: xylanNtpPeerListDelay
xylanNtpPeerListDelay.description: The currently estimated delay of this remote association, in seconds. This time is determined by the NTP algorithm.

xylanNtpPeerListOffset.name: xylanNtpPeerListOffset
xylanNtpPeerListOffset.description: The currently estimated offset of this remote association, in seconds. This time is determined by the NTP algorithm.

xylanNtpPeerListDispersion.name: xylanNtpPeerListDispersion
xylanNtpPeerListDispersion.description: The currently estimated dispersion of this remote association, in seconds. This time is determined by the NTP algorithm.

xylanNtpPeerListSynced.name: xylanNtpPeerListSynced
xylanNtpPeerListSynced.description: Indicates that NTP is synchronized with this entity.

xylanNtpPeerListName.name: xylanNtpPeerListName
xylanNtpPeerListName.description: The DNS name for the peer association,

xylanNtpLocalInfo.name: xylanNtpLocalInfo
xylanNtpLocalInfo.description: Used to display information about the local switch's implementation of NTP.

xylanNtpInfoPeer.name: xylanNtpInfoPeer
xylanNtpInfoPeer.description: The IP address of the remote association.

xylanNtpInfoMode.name: xylanNtpInfoMode
xylanNtpInfoMode.description: The peer mode of this remote association.

xylanNtpInfoLeapIndicator.name: xylanNtpInfoLeapIndicator
xylanNtpInfoLeapIndicator.description: The status of leap second insertion for this association.

xylanNtpInfoStratum.name: xylanNtpInfoStratum
xylanNtpInfoStratum.description: The stratum level of the remote peer. If this number is 16, the remote peer has not been synchronized.

xylanNtpInfoPrecision.name: xylanNtpInfoPrecision
xylanNtpInfoPrecision.description: The advertised precision of the switch. It will be a number between -4 and -20.

xylanNtpInfoDistance.name: xylanNtpInfoDistance
xylanNtpInfoDistance.description: This is a signed fixed-point number indicating the total roundtrip delay to the primary reference source at the root of the synchronization subnet, in seconds.

xylanNtpInfoDispersion.name: xylanNtpInfoDispersion
xylanNtpInfoDispersion.description: This is a signed fixed-point number indicating the maximum error relative to the primary reference source at the root of the synchronization subnet, in seconds.

xylanNtpInfoReferenceId.name: xylanNtpInfoReferenceId
xylanNtpInfoReferenceId.description: This is a 32-bit code identifying the particular reference clock. Can be an IP address.

xylanNtpInfoReferenceTime.name: xylanNtpInfoReferenceTime
xylanNtpInfoReferenceTime.description: This is the local time at which the local clock was last set or corrected.

xylanNtpInfoFrequency.name: xylanNtpInfoFrequency
xylanNtpInfoFrequency.description: A number determining the local clocks frequency in relation to a reference clock's Pulse per Second (PPS). If the clock is running in perfect synchronization, this number should be 1. Otherwise, it will be slightly lower or higher in order to compensate for the time differ-ence.

xylanNtpInfoStability.name: xylanNtpInfoStability
xylanNtpInfoStability.description: The stability of the clock in relation to a reference clock's Pulse per Second (PPS).

xylanNtpInfoBroadcastDelay.name: xylanNtpInfoBroadcastDelay
xylanNtpInfoBroadcastDelay.description: The broadcast delay, in seconds, of this association.

xylanNtpInfoAuthDelay.name: xylanNtpInfoAuthDelay
xylanNtpInfoAuthDelay.description: The authentication delay, in seconds, of this association.

xylanNtpPeerShowTable.name: xylanNtpPeerShowTable
xylanNtpPeerShowTable.description: Used to display a brief list of all NTP associations related to this switch (servers, peers, etc.).

xylanNtpPeerShowEntry.name: xylanNtpPeerShowEntry
xylanNtpPeerShowEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one association.

xylanNtpPeerShowRemote.name: xylanNtpPeerShowRemote
xylanNtpPeerShowRemote.description: The IP address of the remote association.

xylanNtpPeerShowLocal.name: xylanNtpPeerShowLocal
xylanNtpPeerShowLocal.description: The local interface address assigned by NTP to the remote associations.

xylanNtpPeerShowHmode.name: xylanNtpPeerShowHmode
xylanNtpPeerShowHmode.description: The host mode of this remote association.

xylanNtpPeerShowPmode.name: xylanNtpPeerShowPmode
xylanNtpPeerShowPmode.description: The peer mode of this remote association.

xylanNtpPeerShowStratum.name: xylanNtpPeerShowStratum
xylanNtpPeerShowStratum.description: The stratum level of the remote peer.

xylanNtpPeerShowPrecision.name: xylanNtpPeerShowPrecision
xylanNtpPeerShowPrecision.description: The advertised precision of this association, which is a number from -4 to -20.

xylanNtpPeerShowLeapIndicator.name: xylanNtpPeerShowLeapIndicator
xylanNtpPeerShowLeapIndicator.description: The status of leap second insertion for this association.

xylanNtpPeerShowReferenceId.name: xylanNtpPeerShowReferenceId
xylanNtpPeerShowReferenceId.description: The status of leap second insertion for this association. Normally an IP address.

xylanNtpPeerShowRootDistance.name: xylanNtpPeerShowRootDistance
xylanNtpPeerShowRootDistance.description: This is a signed fixed-point number indicating the total roundtrip delay to the primary reference source at the root of the synchronization subnet, in seconds.

xylanNtpPeerShowRootDispersion.name: xylanNtpPeerShowRootDispersion
xylanNtpPeerShowRootDispersion.description: This is a signed fixed-point number indicating the maximum error relative to the primary reference source at the root of the synchronization subnet, in seconds.

xylanNtpPeerShowPpoll.name: xylanNtpPeerShowPpoll
xylanNtpPeerShowPpoll.description: The poll time for this association when it is a peer.

xylanNtpPeerShowHpoll.name: xylanNtpPeerShowHpoll
xylanNtpPeerShowHpoll.description: The poll time for this association when it is a host.

xylanNtpPeerShowKeyid.name: xylanNtpPeerShowKeyid
xylanNtpPeerShowKeyid.description: This is an integer identifying the cryptographic key used to generate the message authentication code.

xylanNtpPeerShowVersion.name: xylanNtpPeerShowVersion
xylanNtpPeerShowVersion.description: What version of NTP this association is using.

xylanNtpPeerShowAssociation.name: xylanNtpPeerShowAssociation
xylanNtpPeerShowAssociation.description: The number of seconds since this NTP entity was associated with the switch.

xylanNtpPeerShowValid.name: xylanNtpPeerShowValid
xylanNtpPeerShowValid.description: This is an integer counter indicating the valid samples remaining in the filter register.

xylanNtpPeerShowReach.name: xylanNtpPeerShowReach
xylanNtpPeerShowReach.description: This is a shift register used to determine the reachability status of this peer.

xylanNtpPeerShowUnreach.name: xylanNtpPeerShowUnreach
xylanNtpPeerShowUnreach.description: The number of times this NTP entity was unreachable.

xylanNtpPeerShowFlash.name: xylanNtpPeerShowFlash
xylanNtpPeerShowFlash.description: These reveal the state at the last grumble from the peer and are most handy for diagnosing problems.

xylanNtpPeerShowTTL.name: xylanNtpPeerShowTTL
xylanNtpPeerShowTTL.description: This fields displays the Time-to-Live (TTL) time in seconds and the mode (unicast, multicast, or broadcast) of NTP messages sent to a broadcast address.

xylanNtpPeerShowFlags.name: xylanNtpPeerShowFlags
xylanNtpPeerShowFlags.description: This counter lists what flags have been configured for this NTP entity. 0x01 - Configured 0x02 - System Peer 0x10 - Preferred 0x20 - Authentable.

xylanNtpPeerShowReferenceTime.name: xylanNtpPeerShowReferenceTime
xylanNtpPeerShowReferenceTime.description: This is the local time, in timestamp format, when the local clock was last updated.

xylanNtpPeerShowOriginateTime.name: xylanNtpPeerShowOriginateTime
xylanNtpPeerShowOriginateTime.description: This is the local time, in timestamp format, of the peer when its latest NTP message was sent.

xylanNtpPeerShowReceiveTime.name: xylanNtpPeerShowReceiveTime
xylanNtpPeerShowReceiveTime.description: This is the local time, in timestamp format, when the latest NTP message from the peer arrived.

xylanNtpPeerShowTransmitTime.name: xylanNtpPeerShowTransmitTime
xylanNtpPeerShowTransmitTime.description: This is the local time, in timestamp format, at which the last NTP message was sent from this association.

xylanNtpPeerShowOffset.name: xylanNtpPeerShowOffset
xylanNtpPeerShowOffset.description: The currently estimated offset of this remote association, in seconds.

xylanNtpPeerShowDelay.name: xylanNtpPeerShowDelay
xylanNtpPeerShowDelay.description: The currently estimated delay of this remote association, in seconds.

xylanNtpPeerShowDispersion.name: xylanNtpPeerShowDispersion
xylanNtpPeerShowDispersion.description: The currently estimated dispersion of this remote association, in seconds.

xylanNtpPeerShowName.name: xylanNtpPeerShowName
xylanNtpPeerShowName.description: The DNS name for the peer association,

xylanNtpStatsStatUptime.name: xylanNtpStatsStatUptime
xylanNtpStatsStatUptime.description: The number of seconds the local NTP server has been associated with the switch.

xylanNtpStatsStatReset.name: xylanNtpStatsStatReset
xylanNtpStatsStatReset.description: The number of seconds since the last time the local NTP server has been restarted.

xylanNtpStatsStatBadStratum.name: xylanNtpStatsStatBadStratum
xylanNtpStatsStatBadStratum.description: The number of NTP packets received that had a corrupted stratum bit in the data of the packet.

xylanNtpStatsStatOldVersion.name: xylanNtpStatsStatOldVersion
xylanNtpStatsStatOldVersion.description: The number of NTP packets received that were of an older version of NTP (either version 1 or 2).

xylanNtpStatsStatNewVersion.name: xylanNtpStatsStatNewVersion
xylanNtpStatsStatNewVersion.description: The number of NTP packets received that were version 3 of NTP.

xylanNtpStatsStatUnknownVersion.name: xylanNtpStatsStatUnknownVersion
xylanNtpStatsStatUnknownVersion.description: The number of NTP packets received that the version was unknown (most likely due to packet corruption).

xylanNtpStatsStatBadLength.name: xylanNtpStatsStatBadLength
xylanNtpStatsStatBadLength.description: The number of NTP packets received that did not fit the NTP packet structure (most likely due to packet corruption).

xylanNtpStatsStatProcessed.name: xylanNtpStatsStatProcessed
xylanNtpStatsStatProcessed.description: The total number of NTP packets processed.

xylanNtpStatsStatBadAuth.name: xylanNtpStatsStatBadAuth
xylanNtpStatsStatBadAuth.description: The number of NTP packets rejected because they did not meet authentication standards.

xylanNtpStatsStatLimitRejects.name: xylanNtpStatsStatLimitRejects
xylanNtpStatsStatLimitRejects.description: The number of NTP packets rejected because they did not meet authentication standards.

xylanNtpStatsPeerTable.name: xylanNtpStatsPeerTable
xylanNtpStatsPeerTable.description: Table containing the synchronization host statistics.

xylanNtpStatsPeerEntry.name: xylanNtpStatsPeerEntry
xylanNtpStatsPeerEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to a synchronization host.

xylanNtpStatsPeerAddress.name: xylanNtpStatsPeerAddress
xylanNtpStatsPeerAddress.description: The IP address of the synchronization host.

xylanNtpStatsPeerLocal.name: xylanNtpStatsPeerLocal
xylanNtpStatsPeerLocal.description: The local interface address assigned by NTP to the remote association.

xylanNtpStatsPeerLastRcv.name: xylanNtpStatsPeerLastRcv
xylanNtpStatsPeerLastRcv.description: The time since the last packet was received.

xylanNtpStatsPeerNextSend.name: xylanNtpStatsPeerNextSend
xylanNtpStatsPeerNextSend.description: The time until the next packet is to be sent.

xylanNtpStatsPeerReachChange.name: xylanNtpStatsPeerReachChange
xylanNtpStatsPeerReachChange.description: The time that the peer has been reachable.

xylanNtpStatsPeerPacketsSent.name: xylanNtpStatsPeerPacketsSent
xylanNtpStatsPeerPacketsSent.description: The number of packets that have been sent.

xylanNtpStatsPeerPacketsRcvd.name: xylanNtpStatsPeerPacketsRcvd
xylanNtpStatsPeerPacketsRcvd.description: The number of packets that have been received.

xylanNtpStatsPeerBadAuth.name: xylanNtpStatsPeerBadAuth
xylanNtpStatsPeerBadAuth.description: The number of packets received with bad authentication.

xylanNtpStatsPeerDuplicate.name: xylanNtpStatsPeerDuplicate
xylanNtpStatsPeerDuplicate.description: The number of duplicated packets received.

xylanNtpStatsPeerBadRefTime.name: xylanNtpStatsPeerBadRefTime
xylanNtpStatsPeerBadRefTime.description: The number of bad reference times received.

xylanNtpStatsPeerReset.name: xylanNtpStatsPeerReset
xylanNtpStatsPeerReset.description: Resets the statistics for the peer.

xylanNtpStatsPeerName.name: xylanNtpStatsPeerName
xylanNtpStatsPeerName.description: The DNS name for the peer association,

xylanNtpStatsLoop.name: xylanNtpStatsLoop
xylanNtpStatsLoop.description: The loop filter is used to control and correct the phase of timestamps as processed by the local clock. The loop filter examines timestamps sent to and from the local clock and can adjust them to account for natural wander and jitter.

xylanNtpStatsLoopOffset.name: xylanNtpStatsLoopOffset
xylanNtpStatsLoopOffset.description: The currently estimated offset of this remote association, in seconds. This counter indicates the offset of the peer clock relative to the local clock.

xylanNtpStatsLoopFrequency.name: xylanNtpStatsLoopFrequency
xylanNtpStatsLoopFrequency.description: A number determining the local clocks frequency in relation to a reference clocks Pulse per Second (PPS). If the clock is running in perfect synchronization, this number should be 1. Otherwise, it will be slightly lower or higher in order to compensate for the time discrepancy between the reference clock and the local clock.

xylanNtpStatsLoopWatchdog.name: xylanNtpStatsLoopWatchdog
xylanNtpStatsLoopWatchdog.description: Makes sure that NTP timer continues to run.

xylanNtpStatsIo.name: xylanNtpStatsIo
xylanNtpStatsIo.description: General statistics on received and transmitted NTP packets for this switch.

xylanNtpStatsIoReset.name: xylanNtpStatsIoReset
xylanNtpStatsIoReset.description: The number of seconds since the last restart of NTP.

xylanNtpStatsIoRcvBuffers.name: xylanNtpStatsIoRcvBuffers
xylanNtpStatsIoRcvBuffers.description: The number of switch receive buffers currently being used by this NTP entity.

xylanNtpStatsIoFreeRcvBuffers.name: xylanNtpStatsIoFreeRcvBuffers
xylanNtpStatsIoFreeRcvBuffers.description: The number of free receive buffers.

xylanNtpStatsIoUsedRcvBuffers.name: xylanNtpStatsIoUsedRcvBuffers
xylanNtpStatsIoUsedRcvBuffers.description: The number of receive buffers currently being used.

xylanNtpStatsIoRefills.name: xylanNtpStatsIoRefills
xylanNtpStatsIoRefills.description: The number of times we added packets.

xylanNtpStatsIoRcvPackets.name: xylanNtpStatsIoRcvPackets
xylanNtpStatsIoRcvPackets.description: The total number of NTP packets received by the switch.

xylanNtpStatsIoSentPackets.name: xylanNtpStatsIoSentPackets
xylanNtpStatsIoSentPackets.description: The total number of NTP packets sent by the switch.

xylanNtpStatsIoNotSentPackets.name: xylanNtpStatsIoNotSentPackets
xylanNtpStatsIoNotSentPackets.description: The number of NTP packets generated but not sent due to restrictions.

xylanNtpStatsIoInterrupts.name: xylanNtpStatsIoInterrupts
xylanNtpStatsIoInterrupts.description: The number of times NTP information was interrupted in the process of transmitting or receiving.

xylanNtpStatsIoInterruptsRcv.name: xylanNtpStatsIoInterruptsRcv
xylanNtpStatsIoInterruptsRcv.description: The number of packets received by the interrupt handler.

xylanNtpStatsReset.name: xylanNtpStatsReset
xylanNtpStatsReset.description: Resets the statistics counters for the following subsystems: 0x01 - all peers 0x02 - i/o 0x04 - system 0x08 - memory 0x10 - timer 0x20 - authentication 0x40 - control

xylanNtpStatsMonitorTable.name: xylanNtpStatsMonitorTable
xylanNtpStatsMonitorTable.description: Table containing the association monitoring list.

xylanNtpStatsMonitorEntry.name: xylanNtpStatsMonitorEntry
xylanNtpStatsMonitorEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to a synchronization host.

xylanNtpStatsMonitorAddress.name: xylanNtpStatsMonitorAddress
xylanNtpStatsMonitorAddress.description: The IP address of the remote association.

xylanNtpStatsMonitorPort.name: xylanNtpStatsMonitorPort
xylanNtpStatsMonitorPort.description: The IP port number of the association.

xylanNtpStatsMonitorLocalAddress.name: xylanNtpStatsMonitorLocalAddress
xylanNtpStatsMonitorLocalAddress.description: The local IP address of the association.

xylanNtpStatsMonitorCount.name: xylanNtpStatsMonitorCount
xylanNtpStatsMonitorCount.description: The number of NTP packets received from this association.

xylanNtpStatsMonitorMode.name: xylanNtpStatsMonitorMode
xylanNtpStatsMonitorMode.description: The mode the NTP association uses in relation to the switch.

xylanNtpStatsMonitorVersion.name: xylanNtpStatsMonitorVersion
xylanNtpStatsMonitorVersion.description: The version of NTP the association is using.

xylanNtpStatsMonitorDrop.name: xylanNtpStatsMonitorDrop
xylanNtpStatsMonitorDrop.description: The number of NTP packets received from this association that were dropped.

xylanNtpStatsMonitorLast.name: xylanNtpStatsMonitorLast
xylanNtpStatsMonitorLast.description: The number of seconds since the last NTP message has been received from this association.

xylanNtpStatsMonitorFirst.name: xylanNtpStatsMonitorFirst
xylanNtpStatsMonitorFirst.description: The number of seconds since the first NTP message has been received from this association.

xylanNtpStatsMonitorName.name: xylanNtpStatsMonitorName
xylanNtpStatsMonitorName.description: The DNS name for the peer association,

xylanNtpAccessKeyIdKeyId.name: xylanNtpAccessKeyIdKeyId
xylanNtpAccessKeyIdKeyId.description: Keyid of the key in the key file.

xylanNtpAccessKeyIdAdmin.name: xylanNtpAccessKeyIdAdmin
xylanNtpAccessKeyIdAdmin.description: The current state of the table entry. If the value written is a 2, the entry is deleted.

xylanNtpAccessRestrictedRestrictions.name: xylanNtpAccessRestrictedRestrictions
xylanNtpAccessRestrictedRestrictions.description: A mask indicating the restrictions to apply to the entry. 0x0001 - ignore, Ignore all packets from hosts. 0x0002 - noquery, Ignore all NTP information queries and configuration requests from the source. 0x0004 - nomodify, Ignore all NTP information queries and configuration requests that attempt to modify the state of the server. 0x0008 - notrap, Decline to provide control message trap service to matching hosts. 0x0010 - lowpriotrap, Declare traps set by matching hosts to be low priority. 0x0020 - noserve, Ignore NTP packets other than information queries and config-uration requests. 0x0040 - nopeer, Provide stateless time service to polling hosts, but do not allocate peer memory resources to these hosts even if they otherwise might be considered useful as future synchronization partners. 0x0080 - notrust, Treat these hosts normally in other respects, but never use them as synchronization sources. 0x0100 - limited, These hosts are subject to a limitation of the number of clients from the same net.

xylanNtpAccessRestrictedAdmin.name: xylanNtpAccessRestrictedAdmin
xylanNtpAccessRestrictedAdmin.description: The current state of the table entry. If the value written is a 2, the entry is deleted.

xylanNtpAccessRereadKeyFile.name: xylanNtpAccessRereadKeyFile
xylanNtpAccessRereadKeyFile.description: Re-examining the keys file will load all currently existing keys in the file into the switch's memory.
